description:
Administrative Assistant ($70k-$90k)

Premier finance firm in West LA is looking for a driven and organized Administrative Assistant to join their team. This position will assist with general office management and will support multiple team members with administrative duties.

Key Responsibilities:
  • Supporting the team with calendaring, expense reports, and travel arrangements
  • Assisting with general office support, such as greeting guests and managing incoming/outgoing mail
  • Booking conference rooms, preparing documents, and printing and compiling materials for meetings
  • Acting as the liaison for vendors and maintenance
  • Helping with event planning and coordination
  • Providing support on special projects


Perks include a competitive base salary in the $70k-$90k range, commensurate with experience, as well as a generous bonus, comprehensive benefits, and hybrid flexibility (2-3 days onsite!).

Candidates will need:
  • 1-2 years of administrative experience in a professional setting
  • Experience in finance or corporate services highly preferred
  • A team player mentality and excellent communication skills
  • High level of poise and professionalism


This opportunity offers the chance to work in a beautiful office in a collaborative team environment. If you are interested, please submit your resume today!
